about.details:
Incorporated in 1995, Nouritrans Exim Ltd (NEL) is in the business of exports, imports and trading of commodity.

They have global presence which covers various markets in USA, UK, Europe, South Africa and Middle East. The company has been accredited as an International Commodity Export-Import & trading company and having APEDA certificate. Its product portfolio covers various Agro based products and Scraps. Over the decades, NEL has emerged as a leading Import-Export & Trading Company with wide portfolio of International and Domestic customers. They have introduced "Al-Ayman" brand in the year 2009. Company's product portfolio covers various Agro based products and Scraps which is as follows:

1. AL-AYMAN Basmati Rice
2. AL-AYMAN Wheat Flour
3. AL-AYMAN Sunflower Oil
4. AL-AYMAN Mango Pulp
5. AL-AYMAN Canned Vegetables

contactDetails.full_address: Nouritrans Exim Ltd, 101/17 Premier Shopping Centre, Mirzapur Road, Ahmedabad 380001

faqs.question: What is the Nouritrans Exim IPO?
faqs.answer:
Nouritrans Exim IPO is a SME IPO of 2040000 equity shares of the face value of ₹10 aggregating up to ₹6.12 Crores. The issue is priced at ₹30 per share. The minimum order quantity is 4000.

The IPO opens on September 4, 2017, and closes on September 7, 2017.

Kfin Technologies Limited is the registrar for the IPO. The shares are proposed to be listed on BSE SME.

faqs.question: How to apply in Nouritrans Exim IPO through Zerodha?
faqs.answer:
Zerodha customers can apply online in Nouritrans Exim IPO using UPI as a payment gateway. Zerodha customers can apply in Nouritrans Exim IPO by login into Zerodha Console (back office) and submitting an IPO application form.

Steps to apply in Nouritrans Exim IPO through Zerodha

  1. Visit the Zerodha website and login to Console.
  2. Go to Portfolio and click the IPOs link.
  3. Go to the 'Nouritrans Exim IPO' row and click the 'Bid' button.
  4. Enter your UPI ID, Quantity, and Price.
  5. Submit IPO application form.
  6. Visit the UPI App (net banking or BHIM) to approve the mandate.

Visit Zerodha IPO Application Process Review for more detail.

faqs.question: When Nouritrans Exim IPO will open?
faqs.answer: The Nouritrans Exim IPO opens on September 4, 2017 and closes on September 7, 2017.

faqs.question: What is the lot size of Nouritrans Exim IPO?
faqs.answer: Nouritrans Exim IPO lot size is 4000, and the minimum amount required is ₹1,20,000.

faqs.question: How to apply for Nouritrans Exim IPO?
faqs.answer: You can apply in Nouritrans Exim IPO online using either UPI or ASBA as a payment method. ASBA IPO application is available in the net banking of your bank account. UPI IPO application is offered by brokers who don't offer banking services. Read more detail about applying IPO online through Zerodha, Upstox, 5Paisa, Nuvama, HDFC Bank, and SBI Bank.
